articles.title: Australian study shows combined genomic screening for major hereditary diseases is cost-effective and health-saving - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: In an Australian study published in EClinicalMedicine, researchers evaluated the impact of a combined genomic screening program for hereditary breast and ovarian cancer, Lynch syndrome, and familial hypercholesterolemia in young adults. The program proved to …
articles.content: In a recent study published in the journal EClinicalMedicine, a group of researchers evaluated the cost-effectiveness and health impact of implementing a combined genomic screening program for heredi… [+6314 chars]
